channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Illusionist/The Witch
channel.description:
**The Illusionist** Alignment : Blue Dragon Type: Social
**Passive: Vanish (1 use)** When you are executed, you instead disappear and gain control of the player who tried to execute you for next night. The player who tried to execute you speaks to the dead next night. Next day both are alive in their own bodies.
**Day Ability: Whispers (infinite uses)** Whisper on behalf of another player
**Night Ability: Mind Troll (infinite uses)** Trollbox **The Mastermind** in the unseen chat. (You cant read the chat.)
**The Witch** (Converted Illusionist) Alignment : Unseen Type: Social
**Day Ability: I can't hear myself! (infinite uses)** Target player can't see his messages for 20 seconds. (Other players do see them)
**Night Ability: Jail Troll (infinite uses)** Trollbox **The Prince** in the jail chat. (You cant read the chat.)
Comments: This would be like Blue Dragon Fool trying to get the Unseen to accuse him. (And gain control of e.g. **The Assasin** for next night.
Please leave comments what do you think!

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Illusionist/The Witch
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Pandora:

The Illusionist

Alignment : Blue Dragon

Type: Social

Illusionist is already a class.

The Psychic --> The Illusionist

Pandora:

Passive: Vanish (1 use)

Passives have special uses. (small mistake )

Pandora:

Day Ability: Whispers (infinite uses) Whisper on behalf of another player

Why would a member of the Blue Dragon have this ability? It sounds like a troll box, which benefits the evils most of the time.

Pandora:

Day Ability: I can’t hear myself! (infinite uses) Target player can’t see his messages for 20 seconds. (Other players do see them)

This would be better if the person could also not hear the others talk.

Pandora:

Comments: This would be like Blue Dragon Fool trying to get the Unseen to accuse him. (And gain control of e.g. The Assasin for next night.

This sounds kinda confusing tbh but I think I get what you mean, don’t know if it’d work though.
